alert.note: Alert for Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Victoria Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wood Hi, or 12 miles east of Victoria. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Placedo, Dacosta, Wood Hi and Bloomington. This includes US Highway 87 between mile markers 820 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
